38-year-old.context: Chris is a very nice 38-year-old male with nasal septal deviation and bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy causing nasal obstruction.

nasal septal deviation.context: Chris is a very nice 38-year-old male with nasal septal deviation and bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy causing nasal obstruction.

bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy.context: Chris is a very nice 38-year-old male with nasal septal deviation and bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy causing nasal obstruction.

nasal obstruction.context: Chris is a very nice 38-year-old male with nasal septal deviation and bilateral inferior turbinate hypertrophy causing nasal obstruction.

tonsillitis.context: He also has persistent tonsillitis with hypertrophy and tonsillolith and halitosis.

hypertrophy.context: He also has persistent tonsillitis with hypertrophy and tonsillolith and halitosis.

tonsillolith.context: He also has persistent tonsillitis with hypertrophy and tonsillolith and halitosis.

halitosis.context: He also has persistent tonsillitis with hypertrophy and tonsillolith and halitosis.

edema.context: He also has developed tremendous edema to his posterior palate and uvula, which is causing choking.

choking.context: He also has developed tremendous edema to his posterior palate and uvula, which is causing choking.

nasal septoplasty.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

bilateral submucous resection of the inf.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

tonsillectomy.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

resection of soft palate.context: Nasal septoplasty, bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates, and tonsillectomy and resection of soft palate.

1% lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: After adequate general endotracheal anesthesia was administered, the right and left nasal septal mucosa and right and left inferior turbinates were anesthetized with 1% lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine using approximately 10 mL.

Afrin-soaked pledgets.context: Afrin-soaked pledgets were placed in the nasal cavity bilaterally.

bacitracin ointment.context: The turbinates were then covered with bacitracin ointment after cauterizing them and bacitracin ointment soaked Doyle splints were placed in the right and left nares and secured anteriorly to the columella with a 3-0 nylon suture.

Doyle splints.context: The turbinates were then covered with bacitracin ointment after cauterizing them and bacitracin ointment soaked Doyle splints were placed in the right and left nares and secured anteriorly to the columella with a 3-0 nylon suture.

3-0 nylon suture.context: The turbinates were then covered with bacitracin ointment after cauterizing them and bacitracin ointment soaked Doyle splints were placed in the right and left nares and secured anteriorly to the columella with a 3-0 nylon suture.

McIvor mouth gag.context: A McIvor mouth gag was applied.

Allis forceps.context: The left tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis forceps, retracted medially, and the anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with Bovie electrocautery.

Bovie electrocautery.context: The left tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis forceps, retracted medially, and the anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with Bovie electrocautery. The tonsil was removed from the superior pole to inferior pole using a Bovie electrocautery in its entirety in a subcapsular fashion.

right angle clamp.context: The extremely edematous portion of soft palate was resected using a right angle clamp and right angle scissor and was closed with 3-0 Vicryl in a figure-of-eight interrupted fashion.

right angle scissor.context: The extremely edematous portion of soft palate was resected using a right angle clamp and right angle scissor and was closed with 3-0 Vicryl in a figure-of-eight interrupted fashion.

3-0 Vicryl.context: The extremely edematous portion of soft palate was resected using a right angle clamp and right angle scissor and was closed with 3-0 Vicryl in a figure-of-eight interrupted fashion.
